net.myorb.math.vanche

Class Primitives

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.vanche.Primitives
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Airy, ExpInt, Gamma

    public class Primitives
extends java.lang.Object
    primitive data descriptions for VanChe standard
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Primitives.SampleVector
      sample vectors have methods for population of the content
      static class  Primitives.SolutionVector
      solution vectors have methods for distribution of results
      static class  Primitives.VancheVector
      the basic vector type for samples and solutions
      static class  Primitives.VMatrix
      Vandermonde matrix for Chebyshev T coefficients
